amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, an additional $45,000,000 for aircraft procurement for the Air Force for the procurement of one C-37B aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2539 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2539 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12784) To make available, with an offset, an additional $45,000,000 for aircraft procurement for the Air Force for the procurement of one C-37B aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2539 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2539 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.
